info.description: A web service for supplying JSON formatted data to cBioPortal clients. Please note that this API is currently in beta and subject to change.
info.title: cBioPortal web API [Beta]

tags.name: Server running status
tags.description: This end point does not require authentication

post.summary: Get gene set hierarchical organization information. I.e. how different gene sets relate to other gene sets, in a hierarchy

parameters.name: geneticProfileId
parameters.description: Genetic Profile ID e.g. gbm_tcga_gsva_scores. The final hierarchy  will only include gene sets scored in the specified profile.

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: Percentile (for score calculation). Which percentile to use when determining the *representative score*

parameters.name: scoreThreshold
parameters.description: Gene set score threshold (for absolute score value). Filters out gene sets where the GSVA(like) *representative score* is under this threshold.

parameters.name: pvalueThreshold
parameters.description: p-value threshold. Filters out gene sets for which the score p-value is higher than this threshold.

parameters.name: sampleListId
parameters.description: Identifier of pre-defined sample list with samples to query, e.g. brca_tcga_all

parameters.name: sampleIds
parameters.description: Fill this one if you want to specify a subset of samples: sampleIds: custom list of samples or patients to query, e.g. ["TCGA-A1-A0SD-01", "TCGA-A1-A0SE-01"]

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Level of detail of the response

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size of the result list

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number of the result list

post.summary: Fetch gene sets by ID

parameters.name: genesetIds
parameters.description: List of Gene set IDs

parameters.name: genesetId
parameters.description: Gene set ID e.g. GNF2_ZAP70

post.summary: Get the genes in a gene set that have expression correlated to the gene set scores (calculated using Spearman's correlation)

parameters.name: genesetId
parameters.description: Gene set ID, e.g. HINATA_NFKB_MATRIX.

parameters.name: geneticProfileId
parameters.description: Genetic Profile ID e.g. gbm_tcga_gsva_scores

parameters.name: correlationThreshold
parameters.description: Correlation threshold (for absolute correlation value, Spearman correlation)

parameters.name: sampleListId
parameters.description: Identifier of pre-defined sample list with samples to query, e.g. brca_tcga_all

parameters.name: sampleIds
parameters.description: Fill this one if you want to specify a subset of samples: sampleIds: custom list of samples or patients to query, e.g. ["TCGA-A1-A0SD-01", "TCGA-A1-A0SE-01"]

post.summary: Fetch gene set "genetic data" items (gene set scores) by profile Id, gene set ids and sample ids

parameters.name: geneticProfileId
parameters.description: Genetic profile ID, e.g. gbm_tcga_gsva_scores

parameters.name: genesetDataFilterCriteria
parameters.description: Search criteria to return the values for a given set of samples and gene set items. genesetIds: The list of identifiers for the gene sets of interest, e.g. HINATA_NFKB_MATRIX. Use one of these if you want to specify a subset of samples:(1) sampleListId: Identifier of pre-defined sample list with samples to query, e.g. brca_tcga_all or (2) sampleIds: custom list of samples or patients to query, e.g. TCGA-BH-A1EO-01, TCGA-AR-A1AR-01

parameters.name: dataBinMethod
parameters.description: Method for data binning

parameters.name: genomicDataBinCountFilter
parameters.description: Genomic data bin count filter

get.summary: Get the running status of the server
Get information about the running instance

post.summary: Calculates correlations between a genetic entity from a specific profile and another profile from the same study

parameters.name: molecularProfileIdA
parameters.description: Molecular Profile ID from the Genetic Entity referenced in the co-expression filter e.g. acc_tcga_rna_seq_v2_mrna

parameters.name: molecularProfileIdB
parameters.description: Molecular Profile ID (can be the same as molecularProfileIdA) e.g. acc_tcga_rna_seq_v2_mrna

parameters.name: coExpressionFilter
parameters.description: List of Sample IDs/Sample List ID and Entrez Gene ID/Gene set ID

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Threshold

post.summary: Get mRNA expression percentiles for list of genes for a sample

parameters.name: molecularProfileId
parameters.description: Molecular Profile ID e.g. acc_tcga_rna_seq_v2_mrna

parameters.name: sampleId
parameters.description: Sample ID e.g. TCGA-OR-A5J2-01

parameters.name: entrezGeneIds
parameters.description: List of Entrez Gene IDs
